## LightweightFloatingAnchor.over() method

notification the endpoint associated with this anchor is hovering over another anchor; we want to assume that anchor's orientation for the duration of the hover.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
over(endpoint: Endpoint): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  endpoint | [Endpoint](./core.endpoint.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
